style_guide: Clear structure with step-by-step explanations, conversational tone, minimal technical jargon, and visual aids where appropriate

learning_goals: Understand the basic concept of photodisintegration
Learn how high-energy photons interact with atomic nuclei

content_points.content_summary: Explain how photodisintegration is a nuclear process where an atomic nucleus absorbs high-energy gamma rays and releases subatomic particles

sources.key_quote: photodisintegration, in physics, nuclear reaction in which the absorption of high-energy electromagnetic radiation (a gamma-ray photon) causes the absorbing nucleus to change to another species by ejecting a subatomic particle

learning_goals: Understand practical applications and occurrences of photodisintegration

content_points.content_summary: Describe how lightning produces gamma rays that can trigger photonuclear reactions

sources.key_quote: Terrestrial lightnings produce high-speed electrons that create bursts of gamma-rays as bremsstrahlung

content_points.content_summary: Describe how photodisintegration affects dying stars and supernovae

sources.key_quote: Photodisintegration in a core-collapse supernova undoes hundreds of thousands of years of nuclear fusion by splitting the iron nuclei into helium nuclei and neutrons

learning_goals: Understand basic examples of photodisintegration reactions

content_points.content_summary: Show how iron nuclei split into helium nuclei and neutrons
